subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties that are common for all UI components.

subMembers.name: disabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component responds to user interaction.

subMembers.name: backgroundColor
subMembers.description: Specifies the color that will fill transparent regions in the resulting file or document.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Enables the client-side exporting in the UI component.

subMembers.name: export
subMembers.description: Configures the exporting and printing features.

subMembers.name: fileName
subMembers.description: Specifies a default name for the file to which the UI component will be exported.

subMembers.name: formats
subMembers.description: Specifies a set of export formats.

subMembers.name: margin
subMembers.description: Adds an empty space around the exported UI component; measured in pixels.

subMembers.name: printingEnabled
subMembers.description: Enables the printing feature in the UI component. Applies only if the **export**.[enabled] property is **true**.

subMembers.name: svgToCanvas
subMembers.description: A function that renders SVG markup on the HTML canvas. Required to export custom SVG elements (for example, [markerTemplate]).

subMembers.name: backgroundColor
subMembers.description: Colors the background of the loading indicator.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the loading indicator should be displayed and hidden automatically.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for the loading indicator.

subMembers.name: loadingIndicator
subMembers.description: Configures the loading indicator.

subMembers.name: show
subMembers.description: Allows you to change the loading indicator's visibility.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text to be displayed by the loading indicator.

subMembers.name: bottom
subMembers.description: Specifies the bottom margin of the UI component in pixels.

subMembers.name: left
subMembers.description: Specifies the left margin of the UI component in pixels.

subMembers.name: margin
subMembers.description: Generates space around the UI component.

subMembers.name: right
subMembers.description: Specifies the right margin of the UI component in pixels.

subMembers.name: top
subMembers.description: Specifies the top margin of the UI component in pixels.

subMembers.name: pathModified
subMembers.description: Notifies the UI component that it is embedded into an HTML page that uses a tag modifying the path.

subMembers.name: redrawOnResize
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to redraw the UI component when the size of the container changes or a mobile device rotates.

subMembers.name: rtlEnabled
subMembers.description: Switches the UI component to a right-to-left representation.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the height of the UI component in pixels.

subMembers.name: size
subMembers.description: Specifies the UI component's size in pixels.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the UI component in pixels.

subMembers.name: theme
subMembers.description: Sets the name of the theme the UI component uses.

subMembers.name: family
subMembers.default: '"Segoe UI Light", "Helvetica Neue Light", "Segoe UI", "Helvetica Neue", "Trebuchet MS", Verdana, sans-serif'

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for the title.

subMembers.name: horizontalAlignment
subMembers.description: Specifies the title's alignment in a horizontal direction.

subMembers.name: bottom
subMembers.description: Specifies the bottom margin of the title.

subMembers.name: left
subMembers.description: Specifies the left margin of the title.

subMembers.name: margin
subMembers.description: Generates space around the title.

subMembers.name: right
subMembers.description: Specifies the right margin of the title.

subMembers.name: top
subMembers.description: Specifies the top margin of the title.

subMembers.name: placeholderSize
subMembers.description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the title.

subMembers.name: family
subMembers.default: '"Segoe UI Light", "Helvetica Neue Light", "Segoe UI", "Helvetica Neue", "Trebuchet MS", Verdana, sans-serif'

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for the subtitle.

subMembers.name: offset
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance between the [title] and subtitle in pixels.

subMembers.name: subtitle
subMembers.description: Configures the UI component's subtitle.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies text for the subtitle.

subMembers.name: textOverflow
subMembers.description: Specifies what to do with the subtitle when it overflows the allocated space after applying [wordWrap]: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

subMembers.name: wordWrap
subMembers.description: Specifies how to wrap the subtitle if it does not fit into a single line.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the title's text.

subMembers.name: textOverflow
subMembers.description: Specifies what to do with the title when it overflows the allocated space after applying [wordWrap]: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

subMembers.name: title
subMembers.description: Configures the UI component's title.

subMembers.name: verticalAlignment
subMembers.description: Specifies the title's alignment in a vertical direction.

subMembers.name: wordWrap
subMembers.description: Specifies how to wrap the title if it does not fit into a single line.

subMembers.name: arrowLength
subMembers.description: Specifies the length of a tooltip's arrow in pixels.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures a tooltip's border.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors a tooltip's border.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies the dash style of a tooltip's border.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's border.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a tooltip's border is visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of a tooltip's border in pixels.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors all tooltips.

subMembers.name: container
subMembers.description: Specifies the container in which to draw tooltips. The default container is the HTML DOM `<body>` element.

subMembers.name: cornerRadius
subMembers.description: Makes all the tooltip's corners rounded.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Enables tooltips.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies tooltips' font properties.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed it in a tooltip.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies tooltips' transparency.

subMembers.name: paddingLeftRight
subMembers.description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between a tooltip's left/right border and its text.

subMembers.name: paddingTopBottom
subMembers.description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between a tooltip's top/bottom border and its text.

subMembers.name: blur
subMembers.description: Specifies the blur distance of a tooltip's shadow. The larger the value, the blurrier the shadow's edge.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors a tooltip's shadow.

subMembers.name: offsetX
subMembers.description: Specifies the horizontal offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

subMembers.name: offsetY
subMembers.description: Specifies the vertical offset of a tooltip's shadow relative to the tooltip itself. Measured in pixels.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the transparency of a tooltip's shadow.

subMembers.name: shadow
subMembers.description: Configures a tooltip's shadow.

subMembers.name: tooltip
subMembers.description: Configures tooltips - small pop-up rectangles that display information about a data-visualizing UI component element being pressed or hovered over with the mouse pointer.

subMembers.name: zIndex
subMembers.description: Specifies a tooltip's z-index.

properties.name: BaseWidget
properties.description: This section describes properties and methods that are common to all UI components.

Methods.name: getInstance(element)
Methods.description: Gets the instance of a UI component found using its DOM node.

Methods.name: getSize()
Methods.description: Gets the current UI component size.

Methods.name: svg()
Methods.description: Gets the UI component's SVG markup.

Events.name: onDrawn
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's rendering has finished.

Events.name: onExported
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onExporting
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onFileSaving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file with exported UI component is saved to the user's local storage.

Events.name: onIncidentOccurred
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

Events.name: drawn
Events.description: Raised when the UI component's rendering has finished.

Events.name: exported
Events.description: Raised after the UI component is exported.

Events.name: exporting
Events.description: Raised before the UI component is exported.

Events.name: fileSaving
Events.description: Raised before a file with exported UI component is saved to the user's local storage.

Events.name: incidentOccurred
Events.description: Raised when an error or warning occurs.
